columns.name: name
columns.description: The name of the resource.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Fully qualified identifier of the resource.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: Provisioning state of the event grid domain resource. Possible values include: 'Creating', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Succeeded', 'Canceled', 'Failed'.

columns.name: auto_create_topic_with_first_subscription
columns.description: This Boolean is used to specify the creation mechanism for 'all' the event grid domain topics associated with this event grid domain resource.

columns.name: auto_delete_topic_with_last_subscription
columns.description: This Boolean is used to specify the deletion mechanism for 'all' the Event Grid Domain Topics associated with this Event Grid Domain resource.

columns.name: created_at
columns.description: The timestamp of resource creation (UTC).

columns.name: created_by
columns.description: The identity that created the resource.

columns.name: created_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that created the resource.

columns.name: disable_local_auth
columns.description: This boolean is used to enable or disable local auth. Default value is false. When the property is set to true, only AAD token will be used to authenticate if user is allowed to publish to the domain.

columns.name: endpoint
columns.description: Endpoint for the Event Grid Domain Resource which is used for publishing the events.

columns.name: identity_type
columns.description: The type of managed identity used. The type 'SystemAssigned, UserAssigned' includes both an implicitly created identity and a set of user-assigned identities. The type 'None' will remove any identity. Possible values include: 'None', 'SystemAssigned', 'UserAssigned', 'SystemAssignedUserAssigned'.

columns.name: input_schema
columns.description: This determines the format that Event Grid should expect for incoming events published to the Event Grid Domain Resource. Possible values include: 'EventGridSchema', 'CustomEventSchema', 'CloudEventSchemaV10'.

columns.name: last_modified_at
columns.description: The timestamp of resource last modification (UTC).

columns.name: last_modified_by
columns.description: The identity that last modified the resource.

columns.name: last_modified_by_type
columns.description: The type of identity that last modified the resource.

columns.name: location
columns.description: Location of the resource.

columns.name: principal_id
columns.description: The principal ID of resource identity.

columns.name: public_network_access
columns.description: This determines if traffic is allowed over public network. By default it is enabled.

columns.name: sku_name
columns.description: Name of this SKU. Possible values include: 'Basic', 'Standard'.

columns.name: user_assigned_identities
columns.description: The list of user identities associated with the resource. The user identity dictionary key references will be ARM resource ids.

columns.name: diagnostic_settings
columns.description: A list of active diagnostic settings for the eventgrid domain.

columns.name: inbound_ip_rules
columns.description: This can be used to restrict traffic from specific IPs instead of all IPs. Note: These are considered only if PublicNetworkAccess is enabled.

columns.name: input_schema_mapping
columns.description: Information about the InputSchemaMapping which specified the info about mapping event payload.

columns.name: private_endpoint_connections
columns.description: List of private endpoint connections.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
